casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Marvin Hakeem JOHNSON No. 383P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 15, 2016. Mr. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. William R. West, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina. Mr. Staples Hughes. Ms. Michele Goldman, Attorney at Law, For Johnson, Marvin Hakeem.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of October 2016 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
